summary: Matiss Zelcs is trying to find woman which he did ignore and who was about to jump off the bridge last night. Police don't want to continue investigation as no body was found, however Matiss is on his way to start his own investigation.
cast: Egons Dombrovskis|Nikolay Korobov|Vigo Roga|Aija Dzerve|Gundars Silakaktins|Andris Keiss|Rihards Gailiss
title: Krisana
